title: How to Make Loo Putty

steps.headline: Put 1 to 2 cups of flour in your bowl.
steps.description: The more flour you put in, the more putty you will have at the end.

steps.headline: Add water to the flour slowly.
steps.description: Keep adding until it has a thick consistency, or the consistency you desire.

steps.headline: Add food coloring to the bowl.
steps.description: The is optional, but of you want to add color, you can. The more drops you put in, the darker the color will be.

steps.headline: After that, you are finished.
steps.description: Enjoy playing with your loo putty! . [[Image:Make Loo Putty

text: Put 1 to 2 cups of flour in your bowl. The more flour you put in, the more putty you will have at the end. Add water to the flour slowly. Keep adding until it has a thick consistency, or the consistency you desire. Add food coloring to the bowl. The is optional, but of you want to add color, you can. The more drops you put in, the darker the color will be. After that, you are finished. Enjoy playing with your loo putty! . [[Image:Make Loo Putty
